entries.text: Assigning a high standard encourages individuals to meet or exceed expectations.

entries.text: Respect is foundational to effective leadership.
Leadership is strengthened by understanding human nature.
Wisdom requires expansive thinking across diverse domains and questions.
Understand the people to govern effectively.

Consistency in governance and leadership style fosters trust and long-term stability.
